Html:
I am trying to use this in a VS 2008 project with Framework 3.5. When I add a reference I get the error resolved file has a bad image, no metadata, or is otherwise inaccessible. 

I suspect this is the problem: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2655763/referenced-assembly-wont-load

I have built it locally (by adding the source code to a VS2008 project) and now it works. However it would be nice it I didn't have to do that.

Thanks
